A Better Way To Fund Your Creative Work

Reclaim your creative freedom, let your fans support you directly, commission-free.
Connect DashPay

Creativity Without Compromise

Sodality is decentralized, open source and censorship free; never fear deplatforming again.
Commision Free
No comission, ever. Sodality is provided for free, for the good of creators everywhere.
Free Speech
Creativity and free speech is a human right, Sodality is an open platform, welcome to all.
Decentralized
Sodality is build upon Dash Platform, everything is securely stored on the Dash network.
